title: What is with my adcs rushing fucking guinsoos?
body: That is a great way to be useless for 30 minutes until you start getting more items. I have seen {{champion:67}} rush it. I have seen {{champion:81}} rush it. I have seen {{champion:18}} rush it. I have even seen {{champion:51}} rush it.

replies.body: i tried it on ashe and messed people up. its completely broken item. esp on vayne lol you can go rageblade full tank and kill anyone with true damage it gives so much attack speed that with boots and rageblade you easyily break the 2 atk per sec marker.
Gotta try and see how it is on other champs. That's how innovation happens. Can't make an omlette without breaking some eggs.
Because it is currently completely unbalanced and people are bandwagoning without really understanding it.
